analyzed: dummantinam kam upayanti na nīti dosā

original: Kaṃ srī na mānayati kaṃ na ca hanti maccu,
analyzed: kam srī na mānayati kam na ca hanti maccu
kam thīka tā na visayā paripīḍayanti
na u hi aññaḥ sa a ja saṅgamaḥ

original: Te iminā upāyena samaggā sammodamānā mahā bhittipiṭṭhikāya vasanti. (Mahosadhajātaka aṭṭhakathā)
analyzed: te iminā upāyena samaggā sammodamānā mahā bhittipiṭṭhikāya vasanti mahosadha jātaka aṭṭhakathā
